meanings.sent1: She resmoothed the table after spilling juice on it.
meanings.sent2: He carefully resmoothed the surface of the painting to remove any imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The cat resmoothed its fur by licking it repeatedly.
meanings.sent4: The artist resmoothed the clay, shaping it into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The gardener resmoothed the soil before planting new flowers.

meanings.sent1: The fabric felt resmoothed after being ironed.
